org.red5.server.api.stream
Interface IOnDemandStream

All Superinterfaces:
IStream
public interface IOnDemandStream
extends IStream

Extends stream to add methods for on demand access.

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Luke Hubbard (luke@codegent.com)
